title: Ultrasonic Chef's Knife
author: hemloc_io
aiHeadline: Ultrasonic Chef's Knife: Because cutting vegetables with a regular knife just wasn't exciting enough, now you can do it with sound waves!

title: Microsoft has urged its employees on H-1B and H-4 visas to return immediately
author: irthomasthomas
aiHeadline: Microsoft tells H-1B and H-4 visa holders: 'Get back to the US or else!' Meanwhile, visa fees just went up by $10,000. Good luck, everyone!

title: Git: Introduce Rust and announce it will become mandatory in the build system
author: WhyNotHugo
aiHeadline: Git says, 'Hey, we love you, but now you have to learn Rust!' Because nothing says 'fun' like a mandatory programming language change.

title: Britain jumps into bed with Palantir in £1.5B defense pact
author: rntn
aiHeadline: Britain and Palantir: 'We’re teaming up to defend the realm!' Meanwhile, taxpayers wonder if this is the best use of £1.5 billion.

title: Cormac McCarthy's tips on how to write a science paper (2019) [pdf]
author: surprisetalk
aiHeadline: Cormac McCarthy's science paper tips: 'Forget the data, just write like a madman!' Because who needs facts when you have a Pulitzer?
